column4: can anyone tell me if ntfs writing has been added to the feisty fawn herd 3 release?
i think its in ntfs-3g mackage in multiverse
not sure on that, it may not be. depends on how the community reacts to it. enabling ntfsread-write by default can have SERIOUS consequences
ntfs-3g is pretty mature, but anything that touches NTFS is bound to be unstable.
